data.name: Gun Devil Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The complete soundtrack for the explosive babe saving platformer game Gun Devil.
Featuring 10 cool modern retro tracks for you to enjoy.

Composed by André Hjelvik.
data.about_the_game:
The complete soundtrack for the explosive babe saving platformer game Gun Devil.
Featuring 10 cool modern retro tracks for you to enjoy.

Composed by André Hjelvik.
data.short_description: The complete soundtrack for the explosive babe saving platformer game, Gun Devil.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 250 MB available space
